content: I don't have access to current fashion trends in nepal or nepalese culture. however, traditionally, nepalese women have worn traditional clothing for everyday use as well as for special occasions. in rural areas, women may still wear traditional clothing as their daily attire, while in urban areas, modern clothing styles have become more prevalent. however, many nepalese women still wear traditional clothing for cultural events and festivals. the prevalence of traditional dress in daily life may also depend on a woman's occupation or social class.
